title: Guyana Goldfields Inc gets going
content:
Guyana Goldfields Inc on Tuesday celebrated its first gold pour with a grand opening ceremony that saw a pledge of a 20-to-30-year relationship with the country. 
      
President David Granger used the occasion to stress the importance of the industry to the Guyanese economy, while stressing that improvements were needed.  
     
He also exhorted those in the mining sector to be more conscious of environmental considerations and priorities. 
     
President Granger said his government has zero-tolerance for corruption in the mining industry.
